All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Background
    This class sets a background image for the Zen initie game graphical version
    Computer
    AutoPlayer is a class which specifies the behaviour of the game for computers players
    ComputerTest
    JUNIT TEST : tests the computer's player class
    ConsoleInGame
    ConsoleInGame draws on the console the game grid's, the information about the game and the result
    ConsoleListener
    ConsoleListener is a class which links the manager of the game and the display of all game elements (menu, grid, informations, etc..)
    ConsoleMenu
    ConsoleMenu is the class that draws the menu of the game
    GameplayZen
    GameplayZen is a class that manages a Zen L'initie gameplay
    GameplayZenTest
    JUNIT TEST : Tests the GameplayZen class which it is the game manager of a Zen l'initie game
    GameRules
    This class opens and displays the rules contained in a PDF file
    GameState
    Defines the state of a zen l'initie game
    GraphicEndGame
    GraphicEndGame is a panel displaying the name of the winner
    GraphicGameplay
    GraphicGameplay draws and manage the graphic part of a zen l'initie game
    GraphicListener
    GraphicListener is the listener of all user action on the zen l'initie application
    GraphicLoad
    GraphicLoad draws the load menu windows
    GraphicManager
    Manages the whole graphic version of Zen L'initie game
    GraphicMenu
    Graphic menu draws and displays the menu of Zen initie game
    GraphicNewGame
    GraphicNewGame draws and displays the new game of Zen initie game
    Human
    HumanPlayer is a class which specifies the behaviour of the game for humans players
    HumanTest
    JUNIT TEST : tests the human's player class
    ModelManager
    ModelManager manages most of the game features like start or load a game, open the game rules or simply leave the game
    ModelManagerTest
    JUNIT TEST : Test the menu of Zen l'initie game
    OpponentType
    Enumerates the two type of opponents that the user can play against
    Pawn
    Pawns is a class representing a pawn in a Zen L'inite game
    PawnTest
    JUNIT TEST : Tests the Pawn's class which represents a pawn in a Zen's game
    Player
    Player is an abstract class which defines all of states and behavior of a player in a Zen l'initie game
    ReadWriteFile
    ReadWriteFile is a class which reads and writes configuration file of Zen games.
    SquareGrid
    SquareGrid is a class that represents a square in the Zen L'inite grid
    SquareGridTest
    JUNIT TEST : Tests the SquareGrid's class which represents a square of a grid in a Zen's game
    TypeOfPawn
    Enumerates the three types of pawns that can be place on the Zen L'initie grid
    ZenGrid
    ZenGrid draws the zen l'intie grid in the game version graphic
